subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: UConn, which has won 60 games at the Garden, seemed to know all of the sweet spots on the floor, while the Cyclones struggled to convert on easy putbacks on their way to a Round of 16 loss.
snippet: UConn, which has won 60 games at the Garden, seemed to know all of the sweet spots on the floor, while the Cyclones struggled to convert on easy putbacks on their way to a Round of 16 loss.
